review: We purchased this product for a television that the kids use in the basement that does not have cable. It works fantastic and they really are enjoying using it along with the video game controller for games. We were surprised with the features that are able to be accessed with this.  My only complaint is the same I have I with the kindles, which is the parental control features. Our children are 16,11 and 9. Setting up individual profiles or enacting the parental control features significantly limits all access, including access to amazon shopping, which my older kids love to use for perusing clothes, books, etc. We are very cautious about the programming our children watch, but also have boundaries set with them. Ideally it would be nice to be able to restrict content based on the shoes parental ratings. Similar to the apple products.  Overall, this works fantastic and video streams instantly. Thinking of getting the fire stick for our larger living room tv too to access prime movies etc.

review: I love my amazon Fire TV. The remote is a lot more user friendly vs Apple TV. I love the voice feature on the remote as well. The Amazon Fire TV never freezes, never buffers, is fast to load, offers more apps than Apple TV. I like the way the menus are laid out.  I wish amazon prime had a larger selection of free movies andTv shows now that I have them so easily accessible on my TV, I watch more than I did when I was streaming through my apple products! I only use my apple tv for air play
